name: init_pool
body: let s = & mut ctx . accounts . stage ;
s . curator = ctx . accounts . curator . key () ;
s . pitch = s . era . rotate_right (1) . wrapping_add (11) ;

name: stream_and_tip
body: let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("stage") . ok_or (error ! (E :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"stage" , ctx . accounts . curator . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . stage . era . to_le_bytes () , & [bump]] ;

let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . stage_token . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . artist_token . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . stage . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts , & [seeds]) ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . stage . key () , & ctx . accounts . artist_wallet . key () , lamports) ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . stage . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . artist_wallet . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;
